text: The Fault in Our Stars is a 2012 novel by young adult author John Green. The book follows the story of sixteen year old Hazel Grace Lancaster, who has cancer. Her parents make her go to a support group, where she meets a boy named Augustus Waters, who she falls in love with. It has been made into a movie of the same name, which was released on June 6, 2014. ==References== Category:2012 books Category:21st-century American novels Category:Amsterdam Category:Cancer in fiction Category:Indianapolis Category:Romance novels Category:American young adult novels Category:Indiana in fiction
title: The Fault in Our Stars
